briefTitle: Primary Ovarian Insufficiency: Phenotype and Optimal Treatment
officialTitle: Primary Ovarian Insufficiency: Phenotype and Optimal Treatment
summary: This pilot study will observe the progression of newly diagnosed POI patients physical and psychology outcomes after initiating standard of care HRT treatment in comparison to healthy female control participants' physical and psychology health over 24 months.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DXA) Measure of Bone Mineral Density (BMD) of the Lumbar Spine
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Change in bone mineral density and body composition from baseline to 24 months
